data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for C Palace at Selhurst Park.
Watford awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a C Palace throw-in in Watford's half.
Throw-in for C Palace in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for C Palace in their own half.
Ball safe as Watford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
C Palace have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Goal kick for Watford at Selhurst Park.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick C Palace.
Watford have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to C Palace.
Free kick for C Palace in the half of Watford.
Watford have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Watford's Abdoulaye Doucoure misses with an attempt on goal.
Throw-in for Watford in the half of C Palace.
Watford are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In London Watford attack through Will Hughes. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Can Watford get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in C Palace's half?
Throw-in C Palace.
Ball goes out of play for a Watford goal kick.
Watford awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for C Palace at Selhurst Park.
Throw-in Watford.
Watford's Etienne Capoue gets in a shot on goal at Selhurst Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal! C Palace have got their heads in front thanks to a Jordan Ayew strike.
James McArthur with an assist there.
Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Christian Kabasele, who is grimacing with pain.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace.
Kiko Femenia (Watford) gets a yellow card.
Christian Kabasele has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
C Palace to take a throw-in in Watford territory.
C Palace to take a throw-in in Watford territory.
Important block from the Watford defence as Christian Benteke fires in a strike for C Palace.
C Palace drive upfield and Wilfried Zaha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Watford defender.
Corner awarded to C Palace.
Anthony Taylor awards Watford a goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a Watford throw-in in C Palace's half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace in their own half.
C Palace have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Corner awarded to C Palace.
Corner awarded to C Palace.
C Palace push forward at Selhurst Park and Wilfried Zaha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Watford defence.
Watford awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
C Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilfried Zaha (C Palace) has received a first yellow card.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Watford get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in C Palace's half?
Throw-in for Watford in the half of C Palace.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Watford to take a throw-in in C Palace territory.
Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Watford, close to C Palace's area.
Watford have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Corner awarded to Watford.
The first half has been concluded at Selhurst Park.
The second half has started at Selhurst Park.
Anthony Taylor awards C Palace a goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace just outside Watford's area.
Etienne Capoue (Watford) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Cheikhou Kouyate is booked for the home team.
C Palace's Jordan Ayew gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Watford have a goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace in their own half.
Abdoulaye Doucoure is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Watford in their own half.
Watford have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Goal kick for C Palace at Selhurst Park.
Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Watford awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for C Palace in their own half.
Free kick Watford.
Troy Deeney (Watford) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Roberto Pereyra for Watford drives towards goal at Selhurst Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Christian Benteke (C Palace) has received a first yellow card.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Watford in their own half.
Free kick for Watford in their own half.
Throw-in for Watford in the half of C Palace.
Corner awarded to Watford.
Wilfried Zaha (C Palace) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
C Palace have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In London Watford drive forward through Troy Deeney. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Watford.
Anthony Taylor signals a Watford throw-in in C Palace's half.
Ball safe as C Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Watford awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Abdoulaye Doucoure for Watford gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Watford have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Roy Hodgson is making the team's first substitution at Selhurst Park with Luka Milivojevic replacing James McArthur.
Can C Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Watford's half?
Throw-in for C Palace at Selhurst Park.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace.
C Palace's Christian Benteke breaks free at Selhurst Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Watford goal kick.
Nigel Pearson (Watford) is making a first substitution, with Ignacio Pussetto replacing Troy Deeney.
The away team have replaced Roberto Pereyra with Danny Welbeck. This is the second substitution made today by Nigel Pearson.
C Palace have a goal kick.
C Palace to take a throw-in in Watford territory.
Ball safe as C Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Watford awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for C Palace in the half of Watford.
Throw-in Watford.
Anthony Taylor signals a C Palace throw-in in Watford's half.
Throw-in for Watford in their own half.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Gary Cahill for C Palace is whistled offside.
Throw-in for C Palace at Selhurst Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace.
Can Watford get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in C Palace's half?
Watford make their third substitution with Andre Gray replacing Will Hughes.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace in their own half.
At Selhurst Park, Ignacio Pussetto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Can C Palace capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Watford's half?
Free kick for C Palace in their own half.
At Selhurst Park the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Watford.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to C Palace in their own half.
Anthony Taylor awards C Palace a goal kick.
Watford awarded a free kick in their own half.
C Palace have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Free kick in a good position for C Palace!
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Jordan Ayew (C Palace) gets a yellow card.
